div1.p: In the matter of the application of F Fetter for a writ of Habeas Corpus

And now the sheriff having made due to the writ above herein and having prodcued into Court the minor child susannah fetter as by said writ ordered and the petitioner F Fetter appearing by his Counsel Mix & Mullen and Lena fetter the wife of the petitioner appearing by Counsel F T Dryer and resisting the application of petitioner for the Custody of said minor child and examination of and agreement of Counsel it appearing to the Court that the petitioner and the said Lena Fetter are legally married and that the minor child Susannah Fetter is the fruit of said marriage and that Maria Fetter a minor child is also the fruit of said marraige and it further appearing that the F Fetter and Lena Fetter his wife have seperated and that the said F Fetter has instituited a suit for divorce which will come as heard on the 30th of June ad 1869 and whereas any order now made in reference to the custody of said minor child Susannah Fetter would only be temporary
and be said hearing and Whearas this Court is empowered Is made the temporary order for the custody of minor children during the pending of divorce petitons in view the it is here

Considered & ajudged That the minor children the fruits of said marraige to wit Susannah and Maria Fetter be committed to the Custody of the "Sisters of Charity" of Walla Walla county by them kept until the hearing of said petition for divorce until the right of both parents to have a case to said children at all suitable times and conformable to any said sisters may have or may adopt in the premises and it is further ordered that the sherrif deliever said children to the said "sisters" and that they be kept undercared for by said "sisters" at the expense of the petitioner F Fetter and it is further adjudged that
I hereby certify that I have executed the within warrant of arrest by arresting the within named Susan Fetter who I found in the custody of Mrs. Lena Fetter at Wallula for Portland Oregon and have her now in my posession
Subject to the order of the court
Walla Walla May 287869 Jas McAuliff Sheriff
